full_summary:
================================-----------

### Purchase of Two (2) Growth Chambers

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01021935
**Solicitation Number:** 01B46-22-160

**Tender Status**: Expired

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RP)

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GDS)
**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
**END User**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Jacques Toussaint**: 514-315-6124, jacques.toussaint@canada.ca

**Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Tender Description
================================================================

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites suppliers who hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PV-19EQUI to submit a proposal (RP) for the purchase of two (2) Growth Chambers.

The proposal must adhere to the Supply Arrangement (SA) contract terms and conditions, and the requirements outlined in the RFP document, which can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/19/a1f5b23d19b17c6fca5b892098f09a44/npp-apm_-_e60pv-19equi.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/19/a1f5b23d19b17c6fca5b892098f09a44/npp-apm_-_e60pv-19equi.pdf).

The proposal must meet all the technical requirements outlined in the RFP document, and suppliers must have experience in delivering similar products and services.

A comprehensive evaluation will be conducted based on the following:

* Submission of all mandatory documents, including certificates and licenses
* Fiscal capacity and audit
* Experience, skills, and able to exceed customer needs

### Proposal Evaluation
================================

The proposals will be evaluated and responded to on a timely basis.

### Important
================

Please note that this RFP is restricted to holders of a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PV-19
